Key Match Events: The Boston Celtics lost to the Sacramento Kings 114-97
The Celtics entered the fourth quarter tied with the Kings but lost by 17 points
The Kings shot 61% from the field and 8-11 from three-point range in the final quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics had won four of their last five games before the match
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Mazzulla stated that the team's offensive struggles put pressure on their defense
Jayson Tatum acknowledged the team's offensive struggles and defensive inconsistencies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics shot 28% from three-point range in the game
Others: The game was marked by defensive lapses and turnovers by the Celtics
